casebody.data:
CADLE COMPANY v. ROBERT ERRATO ET AL. Kerry M. Wisser, Nathan A. Schatz and Thomas G. Benneche, in support of the petition. Paul N. Gilmore, in opposition. Decided December 4, 2002

ZARELLA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
